subitem_title: Appeal No. A-3-SLO-19-0207 (Purchase, Cayucos, San Luis Obispo Co.)
subitem_blurb: Appeal by Glenn Oelker of San Luis Obispo County decision granting permit to Barry Purchase for construction of 3,400 sq.ft. home and 850 sq.ft. garage, and allow grading on slopes greater than 30 percent, at 210 Cerro Gordo Ave., Cayucos, San Luis Obispo County. (BO-SC)

subitem_title: Application No. 3-19-0340 (Moss Landing Trail, Monterey Co.)
subitem_blurb: Application of Monterey County Public Works & Facilities for 0.85-mile segment of Monterey Bay Sanctuary Scenic Trail along Highway 1 from Moss Landing Road to Moss Landing North Harbor, in unincorporated Monterey County. (KB-SC)
subitem_status: Moved to Consent Calendar, APPROVED WITH CONDITIONS
